Moderator:

day_1_agenda <- data.frame(
  Time = c("09:00-10:00", "10:00-11:00", "11:00-11:30", "11:30-12:30", "12:30-13:00", "13:00-15:00", "15:00-17:00", "19:00-21:00"),
  Activity = c("opening ceremony", "launching of phase 2", "coffee break", "Phase 2 implementation planning", "Phase 2 implementation planning", "lunch break", "RSE session", "Dinner"),
  Speakers = c("", "", "", "", "", "", "", "")
)

day_1_agenda |>
  kableExtra::kbl() |>
  kableExtra::kable_paper("striped", font_size = 18, full_width = TRUE) |>
  kableExtra::row_spec(c(3, 6, 8), color = 'white', background = 'black')
Time Activity Speakers

10:00-11:00 launching of phase 2
11:00-11:30 coffee break
11:30-12:30 Phase 2 implementation planning
12:30-13:00 Phase 2 implementation planning

15:00-17:00 RSE session
19:00-21:00 Dinner
